Title: Wonderful Store

Content: I was a member of ETSY for years.  Recently, someone stole and changed my email along with my credit card information.  They charged over $1000 worth of merchandise.  I emailed ETSY over 4 times with no response.  Not only was my information stolen, everything in my account (past purchases, communication with vendors, reviews, favorites) it was all wiped.  Save yourself the headache.  The fact that ETSY is unresponsive and has messages about long wait times is just unacceptable.  ü§Øü§¨
Title: Credit card info stolen

Content: I always thought Etsy seemed like a great app, until I actually purchased something. The payment went through right away, but the product was never delivered. A month and a half has gone by. My most recent search showed that the shop no longer exists. I tried to contact someone at Etsy, but the ‚Äú24/7‚Äù chat was a joke. Waiting, waiting, waiting. I gave up. I will never order another thing. I am waiting to see if they will do anything. As soon as I have an answer, I will be deleting this app.
Title: Disappointed and Disgusted

Content: This is the first time I ordered from ETSY- I needed to return and reorder a different size gold necklace. I reached out to the vendor and he responded back quickly-I returned the necklace and he sent a message that he received it- I had to pay the difference for the upgrade- which I did. He sent me a message and I‚Äôm glad I opened the Etsy message. Being older and new at doing everything on the computer I would have to say this process was quick and seam less.
Title: Reorder a different size necklace I had to return.

Content: I have purchased multiple items. I always check reviews regarding sellers to make sure others have not had problems. I‚Äôve bought everything from Christmas ornaments to several replacement pieces to my Lenox china set everything has always come in perfect condition with the exception of one piece of china the handle in the coffee cup was broken. I immediately emailed the seller they offered me a refund on the item or another cup. I received the replacement cup in 3 days.
Title: I have never been disappointed

Content: I love the merchandise and sellers on Etsy, what I don‚Äôt adore is a venue where once I have purchased an item, I can‚Äôt see it‚Äôs listing photo, even a minute after I made that purchase. It leads to a chaotic shopping experience, if anything goes amiss. Recently bought an item that was damaged, yet couldn‚Äôt see the original item, to see if the damage was present  in the listing photo. Yesterday, bought something and needed to check a detail and couldn‚Äôt see the original listing photo of the item, other than a less than 1‚Äù inch thumbnail photo of it, so fat out of luck. The lack of even rudimentary customer service, is vexing, and the difficulty of inputting a truly exclusionary search the way you can on eBay, drives me bonkers.
Title: Great merchandise

Content: I love Etsy and have found lots of great things every time I buy through them. In this new update, I‚Äôm disappointed. You used to be able to click on an item and see individual reviews for that specific item. Now, reviews are only available in one place and there is no way to sort them out by listing item. I‚Äôm hesitant to buy now because I like seeing irl pictures before buying and for sellers with 100+ reviews, it does not make logical sense to sift through all photos to see if maybe there is a picture review of the thing you are attempting to buy. Please bring back individual item reviews.
Title: Can no longer see individual item reviews

Content: In fairness, same is true for the website. The checkout where everything in your cart from different sellers is totaled and you cannot get a total for one seller until you checkout is infuriating. I cannot imagine this aides the sellers either. Additionally, the new payment system according to one seller is so difficult that she could not sell me the artwork that I‚Äôd purchased from her and she even closed her shop because of it! However, Etsy is still bugging me to leave a review for a sale that was voided ‚Äî go figure. I think their entire purchasing system needs pragmatic streamlining.
Title: Love the merchandise, app not so much

Content: My Husband and I couldn‚Äôt brag enough on Grace Inspired Designs. The love that is put into each bracelet is noticed and felt when designing each bracelet. The thoughtfulness and concern to detail is much appreciated.   We can‚Äôt wait to get our bracelets and share this company with others here in Tennessee. Being able to share our faith in the workplace is so important and wearing one of these bracelets is a great conversational piece to begin conversation with our patients and colleagues.   This is the best gift made with love!
Title: Love this company and the personalized designs!

Content: I absolutely love everything I‚Äôve ever purchased from Etsy! It‚Äôs so cool having unique gift items made all over the world by talented vendors available with one click that without Etsy I never would‚Äôve known existed. My family and friends love the beautiful handmade items I‚Äôve ordered thru Etsy such as a solid wood gift box and sterling silver bracelets both from Europe and a bedroom wall sign with granddaughter‚Äôs name from Israel. Etsy truly opens up the world for shopping from home in one easy to navigate website.
Title: Love Etsy!

Content: Every card I tried using to make my purchase kept saying (cannot use a prepaid card) then on a card that doesn‚Äôt expire until 2027 that I get points towards travel with Allegiant on all purchases comes back with a message saying (please use a card that expires more than 2 months from now) & clearly the year 2027 is much more than 2 months. Don‚Äôt know what the issue is with checking out but it‚Äôs frustrating & needs to be fixed. Other than that, I‚Äôm very pleased with the app & sales & products offered.
Title: Frustrating to Pay

Content: Previously I was able to look at Purchases and Reviews to find items I wanted to order again.  These items could have been purchased up to 6 months ago. I‚Äôm very disappointed that my past orders now only go back a month.  I am unable to look back beyond that very limited time.  Vendors are loosing orders on products that I am unable to to find in past purchases, and I have become very frustrated with this changed policy/procedure. Please advise. Thanks   Barb Clawson
Title: Purchases and reviews

Content: We used Etsy to purchase many things over the years. It was our go to app and we loved Etsy.  We used this app to decorate my office at work, decorate my sons nursery, bought items for his 1st birthday, etc. This app was useful for all those major life events. We then purchased some gender reveal items (for our new baby) from a seller, but NEVER RECEIVED the items. We reached out to the seller and Etsy, both did not help help us at all. They had no empathy or level of customer service whatsoever. They both said our items were marked delivered so they can‚Äôt help us.  We are thoroughly disappointed with Etsy now and do not have our items for our gender reveal party. Not to mention we lost out on the money we spent.   WE WILL NO LONGER BE USING ETSY from here on out. They have lost our business, and that is so heartbreaking for Etsy users like ourselves.
Title: We loved Etsy until‚Ä¶

Content: I don‚Äôt even know where too begin.. I contacted this seller Wich by the way was simple I asked for a customized painting this seller nailed it !!!! Was exactly even more then I expected I live in Seattle wa the price I woulda paid here where I live isover triple   the amount that this seller charged me !! Was also delivered and packaged wonderfully I will be definitely be purchasing again from this seller!!!! I‚Äôll never go too another customized sight again!!! I honestly just still CAN NOT ! Believe how exceptional this seller is for the price!!!
Title: Picture Perfect !!!

Content: I‚Äôd much rather see what my shipping amount will be before I get to the next to the last page - right before confirming/ placing my order.   I was just surprised by the disparity in shipping costs by two sellers, both in AZ, both for a pair of earrings, coming to my address in TX. One was $4 and change the other was $13 and change. Huge difference from the same area with virtually the same product. ‚òπÔ∏è Needless to say, I removed the product from the cart that had the $13+¬¢ shipping. The cost of the earrings was $16-ish?!?
Title: Shipping amounts

Content: I had heard of Etsy before but didn‚Äôt think I‚Äôd every be as attached as I am now. You can quite literally find anything you‚Äôre looking for and contacting shop owners and communication on this app is also very easy as opposed to other sights. You really can‚Äôt go wrong with this app because reviews and shops are mostly legit and if you order something that‚Äôs not as expected it‚Äôs the shop and not the app and all you do from there os move on to the next good shop on this app.
Title: This app is everything

Content: This was such a creative idea and it literally saved my family‚Äôs Halloween. I have a daughter who is very tall for her age and she‚Äôs still just 4 years old. Anyways she wants to be Chase from Paw Patrol but they don‚Äôt make that costume in her size and it breaks my heart. So we have been cobbling together something for her to wear. All that and Covid which I‚Äôm beyond anal and controlling over so this product literally saved our Halloween and I couldn‚Äôt be more grateful. Thank you so much, from the bottom of my heart just, Thank you!
Title: Amazing Product

Content: I LOVE my new vintage Coke mini fridge! I love Coke and I am an 80‚Äôs kid. I cannot believe that Theron at IDIDTHATdotcom found me the perfect item.  The quality of his work and restoration on all of his items is unparalleled. The way he can find these vintage items is a feat in itself but then the skill and talent to refurbish is mind blowing! This is not the first and definitely will not be the last item I get from this site. I wish I could give more than 5 stars.  You will never find more incredible work and amazing customer service!
Title: #1 fan of IDIDTHATdotcom

Content: Everything I have purchased from this studio has been high quality and excellent craftsmanship. I am constantly receiving compliments on the bags, runners and other beautiful items I personally use. I have also given several family members gifts and they were absolutely thrilled. I am now purchasing a couple of cosmetic bags and potholder and can‚Äôt wait to gift them to my daughter. I will continue to look at Northfork Stitchery first for those special gifts, as they always exceed my expectations.
Title: Repeat Customer

Content: The idea is good and it is always good to buy from artists! However when Etsy began to allow people from India and China to sell on Etsy, they diluted the artist population on Etsy and it is difficult to tell who is lying about it being hand made. For a website who‚Äôs purpose is to sell artists‚Äô work, that just seems like a money crazy decision that makes Etsy less genuine. Also the artists‚Äô prices have to compete with those who are underselling machine made goods and labeling it handmade. Customer support is basic and it‚Äôs hard to get in contact with an actual employee. Also you know Etsy gift cards only work on some shops? The ones who only accept PayPal don‚Äôt accept gift cards. Seems slimy of them to do that!
Title: Good idea but Etsy has no morals

Content: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE shopping on Etsy! I go on this site every day. There are lots of handmade items from every corner of the globe (and I LOVE handmade crafts); plus, I craft myself and purchase a lot of supplies from shops on ETSY! It is my favorite place in the world! I have made a number of friends through this site and am truly and deeply grateful to have such a place to visit. I am a widowed, elderly, disabled woman and don‚Äôt have any friends nearby. So, for me, this is also excellent from a social standpoint. KUDOS to whom ever came up with this idea. My hat‚Äôs off to you!!!!! And.... my most sincerest ‚ÄòThank You‚Äô!!!!!!
Title: My Heart‚Äôs Delight!!!!

Content: I have tried different digital planners the last several years so that I have one place to put all the things going on in my life and with my mom. I always gave up and reverted to paper. Until this year and I decided to try Breezy. I love it. It let‚Äôs me be creative with the stickers and the different inserts and widgets, but doesn‚Äôt take me hours to complete. I‚Äôve got a few of the shape inserts already and purchased this one to continue adding to my ‚Äústash‚Äù.
Title: Finally found a digital planner system I like

Content: The three star rating does not in anyway reflect the sellers on Etsy, but rather the app itself‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs if as though they‚Äôre trying to squeeze a size large into a size small‚Ä¶ And for the life of me, why are they dictating when and where I can leave a review‚Äîit should be immediate, not days or months later.  As the global market grows exponentially, so does the competition, therefore one must stay one step ahead of the competition‚Ä¶ With that in mind, one must think smart, not hard‚Ä¶ A company‚Äôs app must be easy to navigate‚Äîfor the consumer to have a pleasurable experience as possible, including leaving reviews.
Title: Confusing‚Ä¶

Content: The new update with the chat bot is quite horrible, once you search for one thing every other search is related to it even if in asking a completely different thing, then it only suggests a handful of items instead of the wide array of items for sale on the site. I can only imagine the amount of creators that are missing on revenue because the chat bot only shows a limited amount of results.  Shopping should be uncomplicated, and honestly, having to wait for the response to ‚Äúload‚Äù every time I search for something is time consuming and quite annoying.   With all the love for the devs, Etsy didn‚Äôt need this update. If you wanna reduce traffic to the site, this is how you do it.
Title: New Update is Awful

Content: I love Etsy, but the recent update where the search bar now responds to you like chat GPT is very annoying. It never shows what I‚Äôm looking for and takes forever to load. At this point I basically can‚Äôt search for what I want on the app and have resorted back to the website version. Why do I need a chat AI (if it even is that) to responded to me when I enter in a precise search? The new search option gives very few options and instead relies on categories related to your search instead of what you‚Äôre actually looking for. I don‚Äôt think there‚Äôs any Etsy customers that will find this feature useful. I really just don‚Äôt understand who thought this was a good idea.
Title: Please remove the chat search!

Content: This app is garbage, I used to love Etsy but honestly now it‚Äôs overrun with ads for things you never searched for and hardly any of the jewelry I‚Äôve bought is where it says it‚Äôs from. Not to mention they protect sellers wayyyy too much, I‚Äôve bought three things recently and the app refuses to let me leave a review over a month and half later. That‚Äôs really scummy, so all these people have no idea they‚Äôre about to be scammed by some seller making fake stuff in India and I can‚Äôt review the shop to warn them? I‚Äôve tried getting my money back after being scammed multiple times now and Etsy does nothing to help. Good luck if you buy anything on here. You might get something really cool, or get completely screwed out of your money!
Title: Scam app

Content: For the hard to find licensed svgs this will now be my go to. For $16 I just bought over 12,000 licensed svgs I‚Äôve been looking everywhere for. These bundles are very affordable and reasonably priced. First time using Etsy for anything and I‚Äôll definitely be using it again.
Title: Cricut crafter

Content: I have started going to the Etsy site for fabrics that I want for quilting projects FIRST‚Äîbefore anywhere else. Most shops are independently owned, which is where I choose to spend my hard-earned money. I‚Äôve never been disappointed once. Also, their selection of hand-made projects, especially out of wood, are fantastic. Special shout out to Charlie & Kate (hope I have the correct names), of Cardinal Creek Home. I‚Äôve spent quite a bit of money there, and haven‚Äôt regretted any purchase. Etsy is awesome!!
Title: Thoughts on Etsy

Content: I love the yarn winder! I had been using an umbrella swift that I had for 20 years. I bought your yarn winder based on recommendations from several friends. It worked perfectly for several years but now I can‚Äôt use the cake winder. No matter how I make sure the yarn is not tangled it sticks at a corner. I have two winders and it happens every time. I can wind my yarn by hand into a ball, but it does take longer. I do love the quality of the yarn winder. I should have it for years.  Bonus points: my puppy took off with one of my pegs and I can buy replacements! I ordered two, just in case.
Title: Yarn winder

Content: Y‚Äôall just made searching for an item convoluted.  There is no need to have multiple steps to search for an item.  I want to search for what I want to search for and I don‚Äôt want to have to jump through hoops to get to it.  And if you (the person reading this) are seller, complain, because that‚Äôs just going to annoy your customers away.  I was already annoyed when the first page became reminiscent of my favorites lists and not suggestions based on those lists.  I was willing to overlook that, but this, this I won‚Äôt.  Get rid of it.
Title: Well, I like Etsy, but the app has gotten horrible

Content: Iv been using the Etsy app for years now. I use Etsy on my laptop too but ya know I‚Äôm lazy. But recently they came out with a new search engine that acts as a text. Iv never been a fan of those types of search engines but this one just doesn‚Äôt work in general. When I search something up, it either says it can‚Äôt help me or brings me to a previous search. It‚Äôs also extremely slow compared to the previous style and brings up very generalized responses. Why not keep the old search engine and update the rest of the website so more smaller businesses are promoted?
Title: Why the weird new search engine??

Content: Updating review.  For the last few days I‚Äôve been trying to add a photo to the last review I posted.  The app keeps saying I‚Äôm not connected and the photo doesn‚Äôt get posted.  I am connected on both wireless and cellular and the app is updated.   clearly something isn‚Äôt working.   Originally review:  I've been using the Etsy app for years. It consistently works great. Content: I have been able to find everything I wanted and more. Amazing items by amazing artisans! If I can think of it, there is a vendor who sells it. Bonus you can message the vendor and get a response within days (sometimes hours). I‚Äôve made a few custom requests from various vendors and have not been disappointed.
Title: Personal Finds!

Content: I love shopping small. The vendors on this site are all small business owners. The people who shop here leave honest reviews. If I want anything custom or unique I start with Etsy and honestly if I can‚Äôt find it on Etsy it doesn‚Äôt exist. I love all my products and I have other family members hooked as well after seeing my house filled with good finds. From drapes to pillows to invitations to hardwood furniture I have brought it all on Etsy and have not been disappointed.
Title: Best forum for high quality small business goods

Content: For how popular and useful Etsy is I‚Äôm shocked at the lack of control you have over content.  I accidentally clicked on a listing I didn‚Äôt want, now all of my recommendations are terrible. There‚Äôs no way to adjust the app‚Äôs ‚Äúpicks for you‚Äù, or remove something from your viewing history that affects it. Half the time I‚Äôm afraid to click on a listing because I know it‚Äôs going to completely mess up my account. Other apps like eBay let you control your viewing history so it doesn‚Äôt affect your recommendations.   It‚Äôs especially a problem when searching for a one-time gift for someone else. Now the app is suggesting tons of content I have no interest in and I can‚Äôt change it.   Lastly, there‚Äôs noticeable glitches. When I reach the bottom of my order history, it automatically shows the ‚Äúrefreshing‚Äù icon for a split second then says I have no orders. I have to back out and click on order history again to see it. But if I reach the bottom of the page it clears again.
Title: Missing key features, still glitchy

Content: Bailey is incredible. Her artistic gifts combined with her love, character, and pursuit of excellence make her an rare find for all of your artistic/design needs. Rest assured you‚Äôre going to get a quality product made with love from this one.   Bailey custom made my son‚Äôs second birthday invite based on a few pictures and some thoughts I threw at her. She nailed it. I‚Äôm so happy with the design and her turn around time getting it done was less than a day.   She‚Äôs my new go to for all things in this category. Thank you Bailey!!
Title: PHENOMENAL

Content: I made an  order and it got canceled saying that it was an issue with my bank so I made the order again with a different card got canceled both times I checked with my bank the transfer went through yet they canceled it and as of today I still have a hold on one of those accounts their customer service says that they will can contact me no email or information has been sent is been over 24 hours and I have received no proof of anything from this company the good thing is my bank will put a hold on it‚Äôs action but there‚Äôs no actual human you can talk to and the only response you get from the company is contact you via email which till the day has not come
Title: Not sure this is legit company

Content: Whenever I need to get anyone a gift, I always find it on Etsy! The only thing that‚Äôs annoying but a good annoying if that‚Äôs even a thing is that there‚Äôs sooooo much to choose from. Title: Etsy is my gift go to‚Ä¶

Title: There is so much to find on Etsy!

Content: I made the mistake of clicking on a funny pair of underwear (didn‚Äôt even search for underwear btw) and screenshot it to send to my friend. Now my recommended is extremely revealing lingerie on real models and it‚Äôs the first thing and ONLY thing to pop up when I open Etsy, even though I browsed hundreds of other non-underwear things after clicking on the pair I screenshot. I didn‚Äôt even give the listing a like. I tend to only favorite digital art and handmade crafts. I should not have to be bombarded with nudity every time I open the app. I know this is probably hilarious to read but I‚Äôm genuinely angry that they will show this stuff to people without permission and won‚Äôt let us stop seeing it when we want to stop seeing it.
Title: Don‚Äôt open in public

Content: I recently purchased the ‚ÄúExpress and Manifest‚Äù hoodie with a ‚Äú11,11,11‚Äù tee-shirt that has the Flower of Life on the back. Title: ConsciousVibesCo is my favorite store!

Content: I have made many many purchase from Etsy over the years. Most have been special, sentimental gifts, including me and my husbands wedding rings! Love it, from crafts supplies, to the perfect gift, or just the right jewelry, Etsy always has exactly what I need.
Title: Never been disappointed

Content: Quick, easy and very professionally managed! The shops have the freedom to operate and show their wares in such a clear, and for the most part, true depiction thru perfectly illustrated photography. Title: Premier Shopping Start to Finish!

Content: This seller is amazing! They responded so quickly, I gave them a small example of what I wanted to do and they came back with a paragraph of suggestions. We talked back and forth then they made a custom listing for everything I needed. The price they told me was the price I paid no additional charges or fees. I‚Äôll definitely be using them again!!
Title: Attentive

Content: I have shopped happily on Etsy from its early days and have always found it a great resource for vintage items for my home. Being a person who truly enjoys personal service, which is sorely missing in a department store,I appreciate the experience of feeling I am a valued customer and appreciated. Title: Resource

Content: I'm fairly certain Etsy has become my favorite app. I love the variety of items found in each shop. The suggested shops and items are always on point. Either way, I still can't get enough of this app!!
Title: Best ever

Content: Wow! I've had the pleasure of making some truly wonderful and unique purchases on Etsy. This platform has become my go-to for finding exceptional items that I can't find anywhere else. Whether it's handcrafted jewelry, personalized gifts, or one-of-a-kind home decor, Etsy has never disappointed me. The artisans and sellers on Etsy consistently deliver high-quality products that exceed my expectations. I couldn't be happier with the fantastic and unique items I've found here. Thank you, Etsy!
Title: Wow! Etsy üíúüíö

Title: When the seller is trustworthy it‚Äôs worth every penny

Content: The search function has been changed, there‚Äôs three bouncing dots like something is loading and then a chatbot saying things like ‚Äúgreat! Title: If it ain‚Äôt broke!!

Content: I love being able to order stuff off from Etsy. Title: Love Etsy

Content: I‚Äôve had this app for years and it‚Äôs pretty great overall. It doesn‚Äôt typically crash. It‚Äôs easy for checkout. It even had Klarna options now. Title: Please just change one thing‚Ä¶

Content: Mostly they‚Äôll give you what you want but also recommend stuff based on previous searches, only thing I don‚Äôt like is while using a mobile device, certain languages don‚Äôt work, for example, you can‚Äôt change ‚Äú„Åã‚Äù to ‚Äú„Åå‚Äù changing the sound from Ka to Ga, which some items might be made by and sold in another language, so you‚Äôd have to type in somewhere else, copy and paste, when most other apps allow you to put in for that.
Title: Easy to use

Content: Do not trust Etsy, spent over $100 waited two months for my package and it never showed up. I reached out to Etsy support center , after reaching out to the buyer. The buyer said they would not refund me the money after waiting for two months for a product that was never mailed out. When messaging FC they sided with the seller even though I do not have my product in our post office shows that it‚Äôs never shipped out from Germany. our post office still shows that it is sitting in Germany even though the woman said it‚Äôs in the United States currently. Title: They steal your money

Content: The newest update has made the app absolutely unusable on the iPhone. Crashes constantly. And they changed/moved so many things to completely illogical and (almost laughably) inconvenient places. You can no longer add something to a list without liking it first, which is ridiculous and annoying. The item description ‚Äúread more‚Äù is a barely highlighted bit of text that‚Äôs extremely easy to look over, and clicks into a pop up as if it‚Äôs an alert on a desktop computer from the 90s. What ever happened to the whole ‚Äúif it‚Äôs not broke, don‚Äôt fix it‚Äù thing? Can we circle on back around to that mindset, maybe? Or, at the very least, I‚Äôd just like the thing to stop crashing my phone.
Title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD NEWEST UPDATE

Content: In general, Etsy prices are too high. To be a 5 star platform, Etsy must create a platform that provides value to the consumer while providing a platform to sellers that makes it worth their while in terms of profit and inventory turns without burdening the consumer and sellers unfairly.

Content: Etsy seems to have many great sellers and is generally easy to navigate, but I couldn‚Äôt find a way to ask Etsy about a particular seller who was charging $128 for shipping a small, flat purse strap shoulder pad that costs $23.  Only when one is reviewing the order and about to submit the order for payment is the $128 shipping cost listed.  Maybe this is an error (I contacted the seller and am awaiting a response), but it would be nice to be able to report or question issues like this to Etsy.
Title: Etsy is good but how does one inquire about a seller?

Content: I love what Etsy does, but I believe that one thing that the app is missing is the functionality of the homepage and the the inability to indicate that I‚Äôm not interested in something (so they‚Äôll stop putting it on my homepage). If you accidentally click on something, the app now thinks you want that particular item/will show you tons of options based around that type of item. I wish there was an option for indicating that you‚Äôre not interested in it without ‚ÄúReporting‚Äù it, as the item doesn‚Äôt need to be reported, I‚Äôm just trying to curate a homepage based around things that I‚Äôm actually interested in.
Title: Option for Interest in Item

Content: Etsy updated their search to be ‚Äúsmart,‚Äù to try to interest you in items you‚Äôve already looked at and decided not to get or that others purchased after looking for the item you are searching. It‚Äôs an absolute trash of a search. Useless. If I searched one thing and didn‚Äôt buy it and start a new search, it should not show me results from the previous, completely unrelated search. Nor should it show me items I already favorited that are completely unrelated to this search. It‚Äôs so aggravating to navigate that the entire app ends up useless. Not to mention ever-increasing fees put on sellers who can‚Äôt even get their items to show up on searches.
Title: Sellers are great, the app is trash

Content: The 2 stars they get are for the people who craft their own products. Etsy loses a star because they also feature ‚Äúhomemade‚Äù products from companies. Another star lost for the search function - results are very literally 50% ads by sellers. 2 ads, then 2 actual results. Even though the exact ads featured are then included in the actual results. It just clogs up the search function and makes it less enjoyable to shop. The new home page also loses them a star. It‚Äôs just a full page of suggestions I didn‚Äôt ask for. Last time was 6 images of curtains. There‚Äôs nothing engaging on a front page like that.
Title: Meh

Content: Had fallen in love with an item with two girls sitting on top of car and went back to order and never saw it again. For a personalized tumbler. Have looked for a month and finally gave up. Is it possible to shorten search items so if you search for personalized tumbler with girls on top of car, etc‚Ä¶that it doesn‚Äôt pull up every single tumbler except for what I was looking for? Very time consuming. Otherwise, I love Etsy and helping small businesses!
Title: Couldn‚Äôt find item

Content: Do not trust any seller to provide what they say they will. If you do not receive your order quickly file a complaint and get a refund, or you will get taken. There is no recourse for scammers. The seller never gets punished and and consumer never gets their money back. This site is for scammers. F Etsy.  The link you sent gives me the same run around‚Ä¶ it won‚Äôt let me directly contact you, or provide any information. It just says you are screwed. The seller has deleted their account. Their communication was rude and defensive. The order was paid for and expected at a later date.  After being contacted the seller gave assurances, but now they aren‚Äôt on the site anymore. And there is no recourse.
Title: Etsy is a scammer site

Content: I‚Äôve used Etsy for a while and I enjoy being able to find some really cool clothes or things. However, it‚Äôs good but it could be great. A couple things that need to be worked on are the filters and the visual search. The filters, depending on what you‚Äôre searching for, can end up showing products that you weren‚Äôt even searching for. This is the same for the visual search. Most of the time it would show products with the same pattern or fabric but the products weren‚Äôt the same at all. This app/site is lovely and I will continue to use it.
Title: Good but could be great

Content: What a great place to shop! I love the homemade items and especially the jewelry boxes. I‚Äôve been waiting about 3 months so far for a jewelry box. I ordered a 3rd for myself. I ordered a pink jewelry box 3 months ago and I ordered the purple one today. They are the mini boxes. My first order was for the pink box that was 3 months ago. It may have not gone through but I did pay for it. I ordered the purple one today and a chain necklace. I love all the products are simply beautiful! I don‚Äôt mind waiting ‚ù§Ô∏è
Title: Etsy

Content: I love this app easy to navigate and make purchases from. I especially like buying from small businesses and having the opportunity to support other artists. I try to do this whenever possible as it‚Äôs tough to make a living as an artist right now. The few times I‚Äôve had a problem with an order, it has been resolved quickly and much to my satisfaction.  Very pleased with all my purchases and seller communications.  Etsy is a win/win situation
Title: Win/win

Content: I love candles! But I have purchased a zillion of them that, when I smell the jar, I love the aroma, but when the candle burns, that scent is not released into the air‚Ä¶ZILLIONS of different brands do this and I have become so frustrated!!  These candles smell GREAT when burning without smelling like a mimicking chemical scent of something original‚Ä¶ And they are priced reasonably enough so that I can afford to purchase LOTS of them!! The names of the products alone have prompted me to send them as gifts too!  They are hilarious and so well made! üëçüëç
Title: Candles you can actually smell!

Content: Customer service takes 7-10 business days to get back to you. Unprofessional service. They deactivated my store for no reason, no email explaining why. They just took it off. It‚Äôs a bad look for my company. When you view the store it says I‚Äôm not currently selling which prompts people to look elsewhere & I lose business. Just an awful experience, they offer no help whatsoever. It‚Äôs been 48 hours and I‚Äôm left waiting for them to respond and I‚Äôm losing business.
Title: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE

Content: Etsy is one of my absolute favorite places to shop! I find that quality is great, especially among the many homemade items that I have purchased! Most merchants are very professional, and stand behind their products. I do most of my holiday, and birthday shopping on Etsy. I enjoy shopping in European shops, and find many items that I would not find in the states. All I have to do is go to my Etsy app, and order whatever I need , especially when I‚Äôm pressed for time.
Title: 6 Great Years

Content: I actually really enjoy seeing all the cretics talent out there and buying from the sellers and for the most part I‚Äôve had nothing but excellent service from, THE SELLERS. However, when I was duped out of a transaction and never received the product, I consulted ETSY via email and was told to ask for a refund via PayPal.  I felt like they kind of dropped the ball and passed the buck and did nothing to rectify the situation, except for block the seller (who turned around and made a new store front).
Title: Bummed in Boise

Content: I love Etsy. I am an Etsy seller and buyer. But PLEASE!! Fix this feature..... whenever you go to post a new listing, it is not a permanent screen. That means that any time you swipe down, the whole listing disappears and Etsy doesn‚Äôt even save as a draft. It doesn‚Äôt ask you if you are sure you want to exit before saving, etc. This has happened to me numerous times as I swiped down to check my notification screen and the entire listing I just spend 15 minutes on disappears. It is so so so so frustrating. Please fix this @ developers!!
Title: Etsy needs to fix its listing feature!!!!

Content: I ordered two items on 5/19, and within an hour I started receiving spam messages trying to bait me to click stuff, and after 45 minutes I had 1000 SPAM TEXTS! I made the connection to my recent Etsy order and I deleted the app and within seconds the messages ceased. I hope no damage was done, as I recieved only 2 spam messages since deleting but I‚Äôm concerned about why a few are still getting through. I‚Äôm a nervous wreck now. I‚Äôm scared to ever redownload or even log back in to cancel items or file a complaint.  If anyone from Etsy sees this please try to reach out so I can help you track down the account that did this.  I purchased 2 items at once. I‚Äôm not sure which one was the culprit
Title: Someone tried to hack my phone

Content: You can find pretty much anything you want here! üôÇ  I‚Äôve bought a few things on Etsy. The latest being a New Cladda Ring to replace the one that was stolen from me.     You can trust that the sellers on Etsy are Legit and trustworthy! I can honestly say,I‚Äôve never had an issue with anything I‚Äôve bought in the stores!  And if I had a problem with a purchase, and the seller wont fix the issue then Etsy will mediate for you üëçüèª  They have Great Customer Service! They're friendly and knowledgeable!  I will continue to shop here üôÇ
Title: Review

Content: I love being able to find custom or personalized products for all kinds of things. Most importantly, for me, is the ability to find stuff for my 19 year old Lexus gx470. Things nobody else makes are found for reasonably cheap, especially compared to the bigger ‚Äúspecialized off-road companies‚Äù who rip us off any chance they get. Title: Great for vehicle accessories

Content: I like sometimes using paper instead of working from my phone or a computer. Paper journal & planners are great because they don‚Äôt rely on the internet working. My eyes get blurry when on my computer or phone too long. These help with that as well! üòÅ
Title: Easy on my eyes

Title: Review Notification won‚Äôt go away..

Content: I‚Äôve ordered and received several items from different Etsy sellers for the past three years, and every transaction has been easy, honest, quick delivery, and of utmost quality.  I LIVE Etsy - did a lot of my Christmas shopping here, and each item ordered was so loved and appreciated by the recipient, I‚Äôll probly do most of my gift giving purchases thru Etsy from now on.  Thank you for quality sellers, all of whom have been great to work with!
Title: Several purchases

Content: I used to love Etsy for its uniqueness and handmade galore but it‚Äôs changed. It‚Äôs really difficult to find quality things and vintage as well. Now it‚Äôs filled with manufacturing items that sellers offer at various prices. If you‚Äôre looking for a specific item, you are sure to find hundreds of other seller with the same things and the only difference are the prices. Good luck trying to find authentic vintage pieces as well, just because it says vintage doesn‚Äôt mean that it is, it only means that it is vintage-like. Good luck trying to find petite sizing for new clothes as well, because if it‚Äôs not a secondhand item, I can guarantee that you won‚Äôt!
Title: Manufactured garbage

Content: I Love Etsy! I checed it out one day after seeing a purchase of a 3D printed sign on TikTok & wanted the sign so I went to Etsy & fell in love! Content: It was my first time purchasing from here and it was amazing. Priya has great customer service and right when I emailed her I got a response less then 5 minutes. Content: Very hard to sign with apple. Gives constant errors in signing in or just not let me sign in at all. Order history has missing orders that have not been shipped or arrived yet. Title: Hard to Sign In with Apple

Content: I‚Äôve been shopping and a shop owner on Etsy since about 2014. I have had to start emailing shop owners asking if they indeed make the goods they‚Äôre selling. Several have never responded, thus I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs because they don‚Äôt.  It‚Äôs a shame.

Content: Etsy is right up there with Nordstrom‚Äôs with me and many other places that I shop I think I‚Äôve only had one bad experience on Etsy when I first started to shop with them and haven‚Äôt since I respect their prices and love all the talented shops I‚Äôm always asked where I get my Etsy stuff especially my knitted hats from Ralista !!!! Title: Best site to find anything ,everything & more!

Content: I don‚Äôt know why Etsy seems to have no interest in fixing their app/website, but they‚Äôve made it impossible for me to purchase. Title: What has happened to Etsy?

Content: Oh my gosh! Please remove the ‚Äòour picks for you‚Äô section or AT LEAST make it so you can hide it.  I simply searched for a bikini and not I‚Äôm getting p*rn pictures as my suggested ‚Äòour picks for you‚Äô. As soon as I open the app, it‚Äôs right there and anyone can see it if I‚Äôm around them. Title: Remove our picks for you

Content: Such a hit or miss. Title: Fix it so we can download files within the app

Title: Outstanding selections

Content: I don‚Äôt even remember how long I have been buying stuff on Etsy. It‚Äôs been years and lots of things! Title: I love Etsy!

Content: So this is a review of the latest app version 5.85. I updated to the new app, and ever since it logs me out. Anytime I close the app, I get logged out. Secondly, in looking for a way to contact them in order to just let them know about the issue there wasn‚Äôt really an option. If I had an issue with an order or as a seller, I had lots of options. To report an issue about the app, I couldn‚Äôt find anything. So, it‚Äôs why I‚Äôm leaving my review in hopes that someone will read it and look into it.
Title: App keeps logging me out

Content: Justin, this is you, I mean this is me Justin! Anyway, your account works, and your price is right!! I was even able to buy my chairs for less than you bought them for. Title: Note to self

Content: I like Etsy it s good app for shopping and online products, there should be more options to get help , if the seller not even responding at all to you I had a situation where I ordered a pack of digital wallpaper on her page she says if you have difficulty with the wallpaper, I will personally email them to you I message her and said I can't open your wallpaper files because it a zip file and I'm using my phone I couldn't even get my money back Also shipping should be free after $50 Thank you  This is Jamie ,
Title: Good

Content: So far I‚Äôve been able to order an art print, CrossFit sweats and a rescue dog dad tee. The print was beyond my expectations, and the seller was extremely responsive to my questions! Having recently lost a loved one of my own, I love the sentiment of this seller. I‚Äôd highly recommend the ‚ÄúOnJay‚ÄôsWings‚Äù shop. This is the first time I‚Äôve used Etsy, and I‚Äôll be back.  And here I am, ordering again, this time a men‚Äôs watch.  Incredible customer service from this seller.  Ten stars (out of five)
Title: Seriously impressed

Content: The app works really well and saves your checkout info so you don't have to type everything in over again. Makes buying really simple and saving things for later easy.  I'm bothered by the lack of transparency on where exactly my product is, in terms of shipping. It'd be nice if the in-app tracking was updated to match with the tracking number provided. It'd also be nice to not have everything I favorite to go into the catch-all "All Favorites" folder.  Also the bug that's really annoying me is there's a constant badge notification on my phone that's caused by the Reviews tab. Except the reviews tab doesn't let me do anything to fix the notirication. It displays the "nothing to do here!" page, which is clearly a bug of some sort.  Overall, a great app, I'd just like these things addressed so I knocked my rating down a star.
Title: Good- just a few features are lacking and one bug that's quite annoying though

Content: I have ordered many, many times through Etsy and have never had a problem;) Then, I did have a problem with one seller.  After many messages with the seller and no satisfaction, I contacted Etsy and within just three hours my refund was pending in my account! Nothing is ever ‚Äúperfect‚Äù but I will continue to purchase through Etsy because they stand behind their customers to make sure they are served professionally and satisfactorily!
Title: Orders

Content: I love supporting small businesses and ETSY makes it such an easy and enjoyable experience! Over the past 6 years I have shopped for so many things:  wedding invitations, wedding favors, artisan bar soap, jewelry, ceramic house address plaques and guinea pig fleece liners.  I have always received my items very quickly, the shopkeepers are always very pleasant, responsive and accommodating, and billing has NEVER been a problem. Thank you for another great year and all the best for a Healthy Holiday season!
Title: Love ‚ù§Ô∏è Love ‚ù§Ô∏è Love ‚ù§Ô∏è Shopping on ETSY!

Content: I remember shopping on Etsy when it was more about having local craftsmen market their products nationally and internationally. Now it‚Äôs plagued with a majority of stores having the same stock image and selling you a cheap Chinese knock off. At this point I don‚Äôt think most of the ‚Äúshop owners‚Äù have any part in making their products. Etsy should have a better system for vetting shops. Verify that the shop and their products are authentic and unique. Tag them with some ‚Äúverified‚Äù status like you see on social media platforms and make sure the spammers products aren‚Äôt at the top of the search results.
Title: From local craftsmen to cheap knockoffs

Content: I absolutely LOVE every stunning piece that I have purchased from Nocewoodshop!  My orders shipped quickly and arrived so beautifully packaged.   As a pasta making instructor I need tools that will hold up through rigorous use and these pasta boards always look like new at the end of every class!  Amazing!!! Title: Exquisite Craftsmanship

Title: Great place to search for unique items - and not just art work

Etsy has been a great ideal place to shop for gifts, I‚Äôve even got the liberty to customize her gifts to say her teacher name, so in all, I can shop for sentimental gifts with just a click of a button.

Title: Hawaii Island Resident

Content: Etsy is the best place to find that perfect item even if you didn‚Äôt know you wanted or needed it. If you are looking for a special gift for someone or just a pick me up for yourself it‚Äôs the place to shop. ( mail delivery was to blame )

Content: I always have a good experience with the small business owners on Etsy. It is so great to support them and their families rather than big corporations. Each dog is different in size and each halter fits just right. We even got Halloween Costumes! No matter where we go, we always get a compliment on the halters. Each halter is made very well, ours get almost daily use in walks and swims, so ours go through the washer a lot and each halter is still just a strong as the day we got it.
Title: Great designs for Dogs

It should be there because the ‚ÄúItem Details‚Äù tab is open, but the description is hidden and I have to click a link to open. Title: Bring descriptions back!

Content: I bought masks from 4 different sellers. Two shipped the masks and two rip people off. Etsy does nothing to those sellers. They don‚Äôt remove them when they get numerous complaints so they continue to rip others off. I had to file complaints about both with my credit card company. I have deleted my account and removed this app. I won‚Äôt deal with a company that doesn‚Äôt care if the merchants they use are stealing from people.
Title: Terrible company

Content: I‚Äôm so confused on why so many people are complaining about shipping. Every store on Etsy is owned by a different individual. They charge their own shipping cost. If they offer free shipping it‚Äôs usually once you spend over a certain amount of money. If people took the time to actually look at each shop‚Äôs policies then they would know. But people just click and complain later and blame others because they are too lazy to read. Sheesh.
Title: Shipping

Content: There needs to be some serious over haul of the crap sold on here. I me stuff that is not handmade or vintage. There are things sold by many sellers at very cheap prices that are all the same and evidently low quality and factory made. These results clutter the ones I want to see. The handmade/vintage filter options don‚Äôt help because people lie about things being handmade. Please try to weed these shops out; Etsy is not the place for them. Also, Apple Pay button on the app does not work. I had to I put my card because the button wouldn‚Äôt click.
Title: Love but needs work

Content: I love Etsy and the app is fine except that it‚Äôs really difficult to search for and find a specific shop. For example, I‚Äôll find a maker in Instagram and they have their Etsy shop URL in their bio. I open the app and search the shop‚Äôs name but no results pop up, no matter what search terms I use. And when going to the web URL on mobile, the site of course wants me to sign in in order to favorite the shop, rather than redirecting to the app or some sort of connection. It‚Äôs all around a frustrating experience when I know what I am looking for and can‚Äôt get to it.
Title: Search needs improvement

Content: It‚Äôs a shame that so many peoples‚Äô amazing crafts and creations are overshadowed by a pretty awful app. The new AI search feature is a joke, I hate having to ask an AI to search and then show me 17 pages of the same 3 items. Leaving reviews is tedious especially since I often order several items and it gets annoying to leave an individual review for every single item, plus now I have to write out a review each time. It seems like Etsy doesn‚Äôt really care about optimizing things for their sellers or their customers, if there was a better platform for buying crafted goods I‚Äôd definitely move there.
Title: Poorly-designed

Content: Update: images not loading in a lot of listings. Must be a new bug very annoying. Can't see the product images! I still don't like that it doesn't let me leave reviews right away even though it says package was delivered. By then I forget what I really want to say and won't remember to comment on the shipment.  Same bug for years: after zooming in on an image, you cannot swipe to the next image. You have to close it out and go back in. Very annoying since all the images are TINY and I have to zoom in to see anything.
Title: Good app, needs some features

Content: I‚Äôve purchased 4, now 5 collars from this group, and they are absolutely phenomenal! As a matter of fact I specifically asked for this collar to be built to my specifications and they did a wonderful job, they actually named the collar after My dog, Stryker. Title: Best collars for a working dog

Content: I found silver bead bracelets that I really like but they were on a heavy duty elastic cord. Title: Special Order!

Content: I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs going on with this app but the last 2 updates have been horrible. The previous update removed the ability to reply to a shop owner from an order. Since you can‚Äôt copy the order number from the app, you have to go back to an email to get it to even message the seller about an order. Title: App is crap lately

Content: I love supporting the small shop owners on Etsy most of them , I would say 99% have worked along with me and my cognitive disability if I need it. Title: Love this shop on Etsy

Content: I really appreciate how Etsy puts people like me in touch with the kind of people I want to support. Local artists and artists from abroad help keep things simple and much appreciated, by me. I prefer not to buy from big box companies and Etsy is the perfect avenue for which to peruse art, amazing gifts and a plethora of unique offerings. I have never been disappointed by any of my purchases. I also, really appreciate the personal access to the small shop owners on Etsy.
Title: Etsy is amazing

Content: I love unique, and sometimes quirky, jewelry, decor, apparel, etc., for both gifts and, definitely for myself.   Many times I have received compliments on items I‚Äôve purchased here, along with requests about where I bought it.   My son and daughter-in-law are the only immediate family I have and I love to order little surprises to have sent to them.  My daughter-in-law especially loves to find a package from Etsy waiting for her and loves everything I send her. She says her twin sister is jealous.
Title: I often find myself in the ‚ÄúEtsy Zone.‚Äù

Content: I placed an order with a shop yesterday and she asked me to stay in contact with her for the next 3 days so she could make exactly what I wanted, well I go to message her today and Etsy is not working AT ALL nothing is loading, I tried closing the app and reopening. I tried turning off my phone still nothing I tried redownloading the app and still nothing. Now I have no way to get in contact with my seller‚Ä¶ I have an issue with this app every time I use it. I used to sell on here too and it‚Äôs totally not worth it they make you pay to put up a post, and they make you pay to keep it up. This app is trash and so unreliable and I will never use it again
Title: I will never use this app again.

Content: While the majority of my purchases are made on the webapp, the mobile app is really easy to navigate and use as well.  This is really just me picking on the app, but if a PM every views this, I hope this is helpful!   A few iterations I‚Äôd made:  1) ensure push notifications have an action. - often times, Etsy will send me notifications of items they think I‚Äôd like, but when it launches the app, nothing populates - just a black screen  2) postal service integrations for tracking packages? If that‚Äôs a thing.. it‚Äôd be great to not have to copy the tracking number, open a mobile browser, and paste the number into the tracker. Often times with custom made orders, creators will often set status to ‚Äúshipped‚Äù as to avoid Etsy‚Äôs terms. Since it‚Äôs not necessarily accurate, it‚Äôs somewhat misleading when trying to look at order/shipment status at a glance.
Title: Great Mobile App

Content: I love Etsy because they make it so easy to support small business and artisans! The ability to save my favorites to specific lists makes it so easy to shop for gifts for friends and family all year long so when I need a unique gift for them I can just hop on Etsy and see what all I saved under their list throughout the year that I thought they make like! Check out my cart and I feel like a super hero for finding that perfect gift AND supporting crafters!
Title: Easiest way to support small business!

Content: I agree with another reviewer, do your research before making purchases!! Title: Speciality items

Content: I think some of the things that just appeared on my Etsy account are revolting. I JUST got an account so I could try and find decorating tools for my cakes. The FIRST thing that appeared as a ‚Äúfan favorite‚Äù are bikinis that show a woman‚Äôs entire breast. I‚Äôm not talking cleavage or side boob or anything, I‚Äôm talking the nipple. What people do and look up is their business but there should REALLY be a way to ‚Äúdislike‚Äù or block things from showing up on accounts. I don‚Äôt want silicone molds that look like dicks or vaginas, bikinis that show an entire boob, or masks that have penises on them. That‚Äôs unnecessary! If I were to show this to my niece, that is NOT what I would want her to see. I think it‚Äôs so inappropriate. I‚Äôm disappointed and ashamed to even have an account now.
Title: Inappropriate!!!

Content: ok so I love Etsy and I‚Äôve bought from sellers on there multiple times but I am a person that likes to keep my favorites organized. The list system is set up really badly on Etsy. Please Etsy, just give us a ‚Äúselect multiple‚Äù option in the wishlist that‚Äôs all I ask

Content: When I am looking for something original I always look at Etsy first. Everything that I have ordered is great quality and I have loved everything that I have ordered. Title: Great quality

Content: I‚Äôve never realized Etsy has absolutely no resources to report fraudulent transactions. I spent over $100 to a vendor who never shipped and refused to give me a refund. In this vendors reviews a ton of people have said the same thing in the reviews but nothing has even been done. Sad
Title: No way to protect yourself from fraudulent Venders

Content: I don‚Äôt know what to say other than Shannon is amazing. She is so talented with everything she does. Title: Beautiful

Content: I can never log in to my account, it just kicks me out and sends me back to the first page of options to ‚Äúsign up‚Äù or ‚ÄúI already have an account‚Äù or ‚Äúguest‚Äù st the top... it‚Äôs not like I don‚Äôt know my password. Title: Log in not available

Content: I adored this app up until this morning. I saved a photography print of rolling hills to my ‚Äúfavorites‚Äù section of the app and now listed under the ‚Äúsimilar to your recent favorites‚Äù are shops selling prints of pornographic content. Title: A turn for the worse

Content: Unfortunately Etsy has been taken over by sellers who do not have the items they are offering for sale. If you would like to give a seller your money and wait 30 days till it ships go buy there. Sometimes they never ship the item at all. Etsy has horrible customer service. It took 3 different reps to get a simple refund. I was on the chat for more than an hour. If you buy multiple items expect half to never ship at all. Stick to buying homemade soap those ones ship. I ordered 2 items and both never shipped. Before that I ordered 5 and two never shipped and one shipped 30 days after purchase.
Title: No longer the quality sellers it used to be

Content: Etsy now seems to hide the information about where shops are located, making it more difficult for consumers to purchase locally. Etsy also has changed their search algorithms intentionally or unintentionally to give cheap resellers or mass-produced overseas manufacturers likely running low-cost/low-labor rights operations a heads up.   This was originally an app that was a very cool way to get a virtual storefront as a crafts-inclined person.  They have lost the original goal in short-term profits to overseas companies, the app makes it harder to distinguish by shop and area of origin than it used to.
Title: Degrading Platform

Content: It is a great app I use it mostly for downloads on my laser engraver. Perfect for so much it‚Äôs not even funny however I have a single issue with the app not the company but the app. So on my feed I often get items that are less than appropriate. I am fine with it since people buy that stuff to however I wish there was a way to say I‚Äôm not interested and remove it from my view without pressing on it.
Title: I love it however it needs some improvements

Content: Within the past year every time I get on Etsy a bunch of vulgar items pop up whenever I search for items such as, ‚ÄúChristmas gifts‚Äù or ‚Äúchildren‚Äôs toys.‚Äù  I recently searched for ‚Äústars‚Äù and a woman‚Äôs breasts with stars over her nipples popped up. I‚Äôve thought about about quitting Etsy over this, but I don‚Äôt want to punish legitimate sellers because of Etsy‚Äôs vulgar algorithms.  I guess the better question to ask is why does Etsy allow such disgusting sellers?

Title: Easy to browse and track

Title: CUSTOMER SERVICE IS HORRIBLE

Content: Sellers are having issues of competitive sellers reporting their items for intellectual infringement. This without investigation is getting sellers listings removed or even accounts suspended without Etsy investigating the intellectual infringement report. I know MANY sellers that this has happened too and once the seller contacts the reporting party that they are filling law suits the reporting party decides to retract their report but STILL ETSY takes action before actually looking into the report to be true or a report because of the competitive market Etsy is. Filing a DACA WITH ETSY takes sometimes months for a response and then still Etsy does not look further. Etsy deftly does not take care of their sellers!
Title: COMPETITIVE MARKET SELLERS BEWARE

Content: Well i like etsy, because you can find anything you want ! But it needs to be updated at some points, like listing the favorite items, need to be more columns than 2 in a row! Title: Good app but again!

Content: Shop handmade anywhere but Etsy. Etsy takes over half of any profit by hiding fees. If you click on a product to LOOK at it, Etsy charges the person that made it. If you but a ten dollar item on Etsy you should know the maker gets about  3 dollars and Etsy gets about 7. If you like an Etsy shop, see if they have a website or social media and follow them there. Etsy is designed to crush small sellers and encourage mass produced items. Many people lose money on Etsy band CANT figure out how BC Etsy hides fees and charges sellers daily...Then they refuse to offer customer support or answer any questions. Shop big cartel, society six, Facebook marketplace, Shopify, anywhere is better than this evil company
Title: Shop handmade anywhere but Etsy

Content: Instead everything was shipped to my old address. Instead of getting any help the site took me to a comment that read ‚ÄúHelp time is longer than usual,‚Äù with no explanation as to where to go.  I have a default address setup. I received no email with tracking information. Everything took long for delivery, and when it was finally delivered, it goes to an old address. It‚Äôs not the sellers fault, it‚Äôs etsy‚Äôs setup, and I‚Äôm extremely disappointed .  *Update, I tried to open the case, but Etsy‚Äôs immediate response was to close the case, stating it was delivered. Title: Paid with Apple Pay and items were not delivered to my default address

Content: Some of the thrift items and handmade cheap crafts that even I can make myself are way overpriced. It is not worth paying a large amount for a thrift item that has been used and worn out for the past few years especially if it‚Äôs clothing. Other nicknacks are way over priced like key chains and shirt pins that are sold for $10 or more. The devs need to do something about over priced items because it‚Äôs already too much with paying shipping and taxes but also for an overpriced item. They should have some kind of rule that should allow items only to be sold for a certain price not a rip off price. Instead of being overpriced thrift items I would rather buy them new which would be much cheaper.
Title: Overpriced

Title: Watch out for scammers‚Ä¶

Title: The new search features are a joke

Content: Twice now I‚Äôve tried to contact Etsy support to ask how to take advantage of the ‚ÄúFree Shipping on Next Order‚Äù coupon they send me each time I‚Äôve made a purchase. Both times I‚Äôve called I got no call back. Finally, using text messaging, someone from Etsy told me the Free Shipping is only available on selected items. The goods on offer can be nice, which gets them a couple of stars, but Etsy is not being straight with people. This can be easily fixed if they want to. Have stopped using Etsy as a result.
