Title: ONE OF THE BEST SHOPPING APPS.

Content: First of all Etsy is a great place to it only find inspiration and ideas but to find items that you ‚Äúcan‚Äôt live without‚Äù. üòâ The only downfall I have with the app is that there are certain things you can‚Äôt do on the app that you can do if you access it via the web. There are times that I will switch between the different ways in order for me to be able to access all processes of my account.
Title: Great app but needs a tweak

Content: After being ripped off multiple times by other ‚Äúartists‚Äù on Etsy, with clear proof and date stamped side-by-side images, (people were taking screenshots of my images, WITH MY WATERMARK on them, and selling them as their own)  Etsy would not do a thing. Major turn off. Unacceptable.  Fast forward several years, and I would like to try again with a different product- but the fact that you cant upload products for sale  from the phone is a deal breaker. Every other platform has that capability, and Etsy is (one of) the biggest.  Ugh. I guess I‚Äôll go elsewhere. Again.
Title: I want to love Etsy

Content: Etsy is truly an amazing shopping outlet, especially for us creators and makers! Not only does it satisfy us makers, but it‚Äôs a great place to support independent shop owners. Etsy is my first stop when I‚Äôm getting ready to create! On Etsy, you can find oddities that you can‚Äôt otherwise buy at big box stores. That‚Äôs why I love it!  It‚Äôs the place where creative minds meet, whether you‚Äôre buying raw materials or selling your creations! It‚Äôs Etsy!
Title: The Place Where Creative Minds Meet

Content: I am an herbalist , and a crafter in many genres. I‚Äôve found so many amazing venders here both in herbals and in crafting supplies . Prices and quality are top notch , and Etsy monitors it‚Äôs venders , so if I have any issues they are there to protect me ! Only had a problem one time with many orders . Etsy offered to help and I declined , deciding to never order from that vender , rather than involving them . Awesome site , good prices , small companies. I shop here often !

Content: I like the Etsy App but I wish that there was a selection to what size you are for clothing, shoes, etc to select and what colors you like to look for as well. I think if there were more selections to choose from the search engine I and others would find what we need more quickly and effectively üëçüòä From  Abby

Content: I absolutely love shopping on Etsy. I love being an artist; it is a Huge passion of mine; but there is Nothing like the artistry or the quality of the jewelry handmade and shared on Etsy. I have not had a bad experience and I am so grateful; thank you so much!!!
Title: Hard to Find; Hard to Make

Content: Etsy‚Äôs app was great but the Apple iPhone up to about maybe the new iPhone 16 I just got and with all the updates Etsy‚Äôs had terrible interface issues with voiceover reading messages in the Etsy app with sellers. This needs to be addressed. It is getting too hard to scroll back and forth to find updated messages between seller and me, and it makes experience unpleasant for me with my disability when I can‚Äôt see the screen, I rely on voiceover
Title: Voiceover interface, lousy with Etsy‚Äôs messages in the app

It doesn‚Äôt allow you to provide feedback to the developers like other apps do.  I absolutely hate that I get emails and notifications that I need to do a review but then when I go in to do the review it, it says I‚Äôm all caught up and I have no reviews.  But it won‚Äôt clear the emails and alerts!   They need to add an ‚Äúapp Feedback‚Äù  link so people can give feedback on the app.
Title: Love Etsy but not a fan of the App

Content: It's extremely annoying that you can't add more items once it hits a certain amount while creating a list, I know I can go back and add more manually but what is the point of having a limit while creating a list? It's easier for me than going back through my entire favorites and adding each manually, and the fact that there's a limit seems pointless & should be removed
Title: List limits

Content: Etsy is great. However, one small ‚Äúfeature‚Äù that drives me up the wall. Badge notifications will never go away, and there‚Äôs no way to clear them. Nor is there documentation for how to clear them. I‚Äôve disabled all push notifications, and with that not working, simply turned off all notifications for Etsy on iOS. I‚Äôm sure this is not what Etsy wants, but oh well. I‚Äôm tired of it.
Title: Great, BUT. Annoying notifications, can‚Äôt clear

Content: God bless Tatiana!!! She is a very kind woman, who understands that people make mistakes. I didn‚Äôt see the option to order the petticoat, and Tatiana let me order it after the fact and shipped it right away. Please take it from someone who almost ruined the birthday dress. ‚ÄúOrder the petticoat‚Äù The dress looks completely different without it, and I don‚Äôt think you‚Äôll be very happy as I wasn‚Äôt. If you want, (A+) customer service and you want to do business with a woman who actually cares about her products, Tatiana is so thoughtful and (‚ÄòKind‚Äù). Please do yourself a favor and order from Her. She‚Äôs a small business owner, takes pride in her work, and the dresses she makes are absolutely beautiful.üíó
Title: Best customer service I‚Äôve had in a long time

Content: I love Esty! Thank you for having an amazing selection of sellers with small businesses. I appreciate all you do! Esty‚Ä¶thank you for providing the space for all groups and backgrounds to grow.üôèüèºüòò

It‚Äôs like a long extra step to download what you already purchased in the app. Otherwise perfect.
Title: Etsy options

Content: I appreciate that there‚Äôs a website that let‚Äôs artists and creators share their creations.  I like to buy patterns from other creators because I just don‚Äôt find that part of the craft that I like to work enjoyable. Title: I appreciate that there‚Äôs a website that let‚Äôs artists sell their crafts

Content: I started looking for a special honeymoon attire. Etsy was my first  catalogue I checked.  I did not look anywhere!   Knowing that I did not if the order was to come on time because I lived in Georgia but married in PA.  I asked if my order could been delivered on  a specific date because we were living for PA  where families  prepared our ceremony . Well!  Not only the order came on time but, a  week  It was  so late when I  ordered.  Not only came before the trip but came a week in advanced. Msg amber
Title: I love Etsy, 2016 I was marryingthe love of my life.

Content: Even though I have requested to receive only messages from sellers and messages regarding any orders, the "messages from sellers" notification includes annoying spam every time one of the shops that I follow has something new! :( That should be contained under "Etsy trends and updates"or it should have a separate notifications altogether. Title: Unwanted Notifications Spam

Content: I enjoy the uniqueness of these mostly hand made items. I have bought many items that I am thrilled with. My granddaughter is going to be 3 years old. It looks just like the original dress that Dorothy wore. She has her red Dorothy shoes for now. I am looking forward to giving it to her.
Title: Items on this sight

Content: After the last update I no longer have the ‚ÄúUpdates‚Äù button in the App, but there is now a red indicator dot by the ‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù button. Title: ‚ÄúUpdates‚Äù removed from App

Title: Ring holder necklace pendant

Title: Shipment on Christmas Order

Content: I‚Äôve tried to buy several things off this site, but after I add them to my cart it will not let me check out, and it is not for just one shop it‚Äôs happened every time I‚Äôve ever tried and i just gave up trying, I‚Äôve gotten no help from the people who run the app and no way to buy the things I‚Äôm trying to buy, all I ever get is ‚Äúhmm something went wrong‚Äù with no information on WHAT went wrong or how to fix it and it happens before I ever even put my payment information in, it won‚Äôt even give me the option to, it‚Äôs always just ‚Äúhmm something went wrong‚Äù no matter what I try
Title: Disappointed and mad

Title: Awsome Customer Service.

Content: I applaud the clean and streamlined design, but trying to find my wife‚Äôs favorites was a nightmare. It is very difficult to surface user results in search, and navigating to people‚Äôs profiles is unintuitive, requiring digging through DMs or searching for their defunct store name. Improving the social features (dms, finding user profiles, easy way to view users that you are following, quick navigation to user profiles, finding their saved favorites and lists) would go a long way towards making this a great app.
Title: Clean app, but lacking in functionality

Content: The Etsy app makes it easy to search and save favorite items; you can even save under different lists so don‚Äôt have to have one ‚Äúwishlist‚Äù that is super long. It easily connects to PayPal for transactions and makes ordering and shipping easy. I like that it is also easy to contact the sellers through the app about any questions or customization needed.
Title: Love finding unique items

Content: I can always find exactly what I need right here on Etsy. This website has been in my life for years now, and it has helped me find items of my wildest dreams! I have in the past and will continue to direct others here. It‚Äôs amazing how this website has stores that will appeal to literally everyone making it possible for them to find something that they, or a loved one, will cherish for years to come!
Title: Etsy Marketplace

Content: I ordered 4/13 from DivaSupply.  They got order out quickly.  Product comes from Mexico.  It sailed through customs and across the US.  My package went missing between my local post office and the point before that, an hour away.  The vendor is absolutely no help in getting it resolved.  I mean zero help.  I opened a case per Etsy guidelines after a month.  After 3 days I escalated to Etsy for review per their system.  Two weeks later I haven‚Äôt heard anything.  They don‚Äôt really have a way to reach anyone that I can find other than the unhelpful seller.  I would like the product I ordered, or my money back.  I won‚Äôt ever order from Etsy again.
Title: Be careful!  Unethical!

Content: Etsy app and mobile website constantly tell me I‚Äôm not connected to the internet (I am, other apps loading/refreshing fine). Now and then I can access Etsy but more often than not these days, I can‚Äôt. I have a transaction I‚Äôm trying to check on and I have no way of doing that as long as I am prevented from logging in. (My OS is totally up to date.)
Title: Constantly not loading

Content: We need to remember that mom and pop shops are alive and well. We‚Äôve all started doing business through and on Social Market shopping malls like Etsy. Content: As an Etsy shopkeeper, I have to say that I do 95% of my shop work on my phone app: listing, photography, editing and some financial functions. In fact, I think I wore off my fingerprints. I have a high level of trust for the site - and I think the buying public does, as well. It‚Äôs a very friendly place, too - I have gotten thank you notes in the mail from happy customers. Love being an Etsy seller of vintage clothing, bedspreads & smalls. So much fun. Thank you!
Title: Love the app

Content: So let‚Äôs not mince words here- Etsy is full of resellers selling cheap mass produced garbage at a step step price under the guise of it being handmade. That said, as long as your smart you can find some really truly awesome stuff on Etsy. I‚Äôve had many custom made custom ordered dresses from Etsy. Handmade geeky jewelry and intricate headdresses, handmade leather bdsm accessories you name it. I love Etsy. Just, you know, double check stuff when you‚Äôre there.
Title: Great homemade stuff as long as your smart

Content: I love shopping on Etsy because the items can be purchased from so many countries across the whole planet earth. Also the Americans have the worst weather situations such as floods, wildfires, hurricanes, tornadoes, blizzards etc, then add tragedies such as theft or fires or vandalism, so at least on Etsy maybe a lost item that was a source of fond memories could possibly be recovered by a seller on Etsy.

Content: I have used Etsy for years and love the ease of the app. I have lots of favorite stores and items plus I like to put stuff in my cart while I compare and browse, but today I realized when I click add to cart I am now taken to the cart and have no option to just go back to continue browsing without losing my place in my search WHAT happened? There‚Äôs no point in me using the app for browsing and adding stuff to my cart which I love to do on my downtime. I also lost the ability to pay each store separately. I can see from other reviewers this is an issue for others. Please fix it.
Title: This was my favorite shopping App but something changed?!

Content: I usually love Etsy but they apparently have moved product name/title down the page entirely. Honestly it‚Äôs super obnoxious to have to scroll down each and every product page to find the NAME of what I‚Äôm looking at, let alone any information about it.  Why did Etsy change this? Why did they even move the TITLE/NAME of the product down below the reviews?? Please change this back! Or at least list the product‚Äôs title where it used to be, right underneath the picture.
Title: Usually 5 stars BUT they moved the item name/info down to bottom of page??

Content: If you want to treat yourself to something amazing or give someone a gift they‚Äôll cherish for life, you‚Äôre in the right place. The richness of talent you‚Äôll find here  brings smiles just looking and with that in mind, plan to make time to find what you‚Äôd like because you‚Äôll find many variations of it. You‚Äôll also wander off on another item, or two, or possibly twenty!
Title: The World‚Äôs Best Place to Shop

Content: Oh yay another update where they force annoying notifications! Now, ‚Äòfavorites‚Äô is merged with ‚Äòupdates,‚Äôbut they keep both. So now, you‚Äôll get those little annoying orange notifications under both! They‚Äôre also pushing ‚Äòshops to follow‚Äô under updates; why?!!!! The algorithm is broke because they‚Äôre telling me to follow shops I already follow! Updates should be just that and nothing more! I‚Äôd say fix it, but they consider all of this annoying stuff as features! I‚Äôm deleting and going through shops outside of Etsy. Sorry Etsy shop owners, my ocd can‚Äôt deal with this app anymore.

Content: The overall app, much like the website, is amazing. It is very easy to navigate, save items, and pay for them. The only issue I have is the notifications for purchase that ‚ÄúNeed to be Reviewed‚Äù is bugged and shows things that aren‚Äôt there. They say it drops off in 100 days but it does not.  ***UPDATE*** I attempted the developer ‚Äútrick‚Äù of contacting customer service which I did. No change.
Title: Overall Amazing -UPDATE

Content: Love looking at unique and affordable pieces on the Etsy app. I have been a long time customer and love shopping for bibles, Inter design items, or vintage clothing. Title: I can scroll for hours

Content: I have ordered items from 2 different vendors and have seen a ‚ÄúThank you for your Order.  A receipt has been sent to ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Äù. It is not my email address.  I wasn‚Äôt given an option when placing the order to give an email address.  How do I track my orders?  Other than this issue.  I enjoy the convenience of shopping on Etsy. Title: Email Responses From Vendors

Content: I ordered a neon sign in red letter of my grandsons name (Bradley) through an Etsy business (Ahoy Craft). The order was placed on October 26. The funds were released on the same day. I never received my purchase. I have tried to find a person to talk to but was only given an email to send communications through. All emails have been ignored and I have no idea what happened to my sign. I am on the verge of calling our local consumer protection office to see if they can help. It‚Äôs obvious to me that Etsy /Ahoy Crafts are not very consumer friendly and I would strongly recommend that purchases be made elsewhere. I will never shop through Etsy again.
Title: Dissatisfied

Content: So almost 6 months ago I upgraded my iphone. No biggie, everything switches over, but the Etsy App won‚Äôt let me sign in.  Get a generic error message with no instructions.  Multiple rounds of emails with ‚ÄòCustomer Support‚Äô‚Ä¶   Try reloading the app.  Not working? Then why don‚Äôt you reactivate your decade old Etsy Storefront and give us a credit card number‚Ä¶ No? Oh. Here‚Äôs another generic link to a help page that‚Äôs useless.  Not helpful? Try reloading the app, because we don‚Äôt know what else to say because we can‚Äôt admit there‚Äôs an issue with the backend UI, or that we could help you, but we see you‚Äôre someone who won‚Äôt be fobbed off with a non-helpful answer or give us access to your CC.  Why don‚Äôt you start using your browser?  Seriously, that‚Äôs what I got.  If the app works for you - great!  Etsy is full of amazing independent sellers whom I support 100%.  The company‚Äôs support - that‚Äôs another story.    Thanks but no thanks.
Title: Great independent Sellers - Worst App Customer Service

Content: I‚Äôve been using this app for years now and this is the first time I‚Äôve written a review, but I felt compelled to let everyone know that this app is a must have. Title: Sweet smelling scrubs!!‚ù§Ô∏è

Content: The site positions itself as a platform for original goods and needlework, but in fact there are ordinary Chinese goods and people who resell them! Title: Thank you!

Content: I only wish this one star review would hurt Etsy as much as a one star due to shipping (out of sellers control) hurts the shops they claim to care about.  Heck, even a single 4 star review will drop how much a shop is seen now and sales can plummet.  Everyone, both Etsy and buyers should be ashamed at setting impossible standards for handmade items and especially so with all of the shipping delays.  If you‚Äôre happy with your items, do those who work very hard at making them a favor and give nothing less than 5 star reviews unless it‚Äôs absolutely warranted. Etsy, start listening to  shops that have made you BILLIONS in fees, please.
Title: Star seller

Content: Etsy has recommended a very lewd shop. I wanted to delete that recommendation but there is no option to do so. Also Etsy makes it almost impossible to contact them. When I emailed their support email, I got auto responded with something to the effect of ‚Äúwe don‚Äôt check this inbox.‚Äù Their help menu is super UNhelpful and  frustrating. All I want is to browse Etsy without seeing people‚Äôs body parts. Please fix this Etsy!!!
Title: Inappropriate recommended shops and no way to fix it

Title: Need to fix strange new update

Content: first of all, to etsy, the new search bot thing is god awful. what on earth were you thinking. please get rid of that asap.   secondly, to remove that when you are in the search mode, next to the chat text box at the bottom of the screen is a slider looking icon. it‚Äôs the settings for the chat. click that icon. then, at the bottom of the settings is a ‚Äúleave guided search‚Äù. click on that. it takes you back to the normal search.   basically, click the settings button. click on ‚Äúleave guided search‚Äù. done. hope that helps somebody out.
Title: HOW TO REMOVE THE CHAT SEARCH

Content: I love Etsy, however the new update has changed the appearance and free shipping is more difficult to see, and so is the rating of the product. The free shipping was previously easy to spot out with a grey box around it, and now it is just in green letters that don‚Äôt really contrast much making it more difficult to see.   Aside from that the set up has changed and I am just bummed. Not sure if Etsy plans on keeping it this way, but this is my feedback of the newest update.
Title: New update 11/21

Content: Several years ago when I first started using this platform, it was great! It really was almost entirely individual artists or very small shops selling. I could search (and sell!) pretty easily without having to wade for hours through a sea of kitschy, NOT handmade crap. Please, please , please, improve your filtering process; at the very least. Sure, bigger businesses probably help the profits, but you will eventually lose buyers who are really looking for artisan work.

Title: Love the app

Content: If you sign up with Etsy through the App and not the website YOUR PROFILE AND ALL YOUR LIKES ARE PUBLIC BY DEFAULT.  I now have ‚Äúfollowers‚Äù that I did not invite or authorize and have no way to block or delete them from the app.  I REPEAT THERE IS NO ABILITY TO CHANGE PRIVACY SETTINGS ON YOUR PROFILE OR BLOCK PEOPLE WITHIN THE APP. THIS IS A HUGE VIOLATION OF PRIVACY AND AN INCONVENIENCE FOR PEOPLE WITHOUT LAPTOPS.  This is not a social network nor is it advertised or disclosed that you will have friends/followers based on your shopping habits.   I have only ever used Etsy from the app and now to find out that you must go to the website to change your privacy settings is completely misleading and a violation of trust and privacy. I am surprised Apple would even allow an app like this in the App Store given that the app has no built in block features.   THIS IS A HUGE LIABILITY ISSUE AND THERE SHOULD BE A LAWSUIT OVER THIS VIOLATION OF PUBLIC TRUST.
Title: NO ABILITY TO CHANGE PRIVACY SETTINGS IN APP

Title: Cannot Purchase in App

Content: I love Etsy! But I hate that you can't block shops or edit what it suggests to you. I've had really gross/gore-y suggestions just after purchasing a gummy bear phone case.. the shop/item that was suggested to me was from a different shop & shared the "bear tag." I had to erase my history so that the disturbing suggestion/image would leave my screen. Otherwise Etsy is great & this app is so easy to use!
Title: I wish I could give this a 5

Content: Not sure on what‚Äôs going on but this new update to the app has me logging in every time I get ready to go into the app. It‚Äôs really annoying and a big inconvenience. If you‚Äôre going to have us log in each time at least enable face recognition or fingerprint recognition. I might as well access Etsy on my PC if this the case at least I stay signed on for a few days before it logs me out and I get to auto save my log in. This is something you guys need to work on
Title: New update

Content: This is my second order from this shop and that means it will be added as one of my favorites.  I originally placed an order because she had boxes to match heather kell planner stickers.  This order is for pure planner addict fix.  Her colors and her kits fit my mood perfectly.  Delivery is not bad also plus I get to support black owned business.  Heck ya!!!  Now I have to adjust my budget.<3
Title: Second order

Content: I purchased this Kobe pendant because I hadn‚Äôt seen anything like it. I asked Stella some questions about the pendant, she was very quick to reply.  She answered my questions to my complete satisfaction. She was very courteous and professional. My satisfaction was her top priority. I can honestly say that I was impressed. I‚Äôm looking forward to seeing more of her items. I‚Äôm definitely going to follow you. Thanks Stella.
Title: Kobe pendant

Content: I have had Etsy for awhile, but hasn‚Äôt had the need to buy anything until recently. Many of the items I decide to purchase going into my cart, but the saved portion. Unfortunately, over the past couple of weeks, that side of the cart won‚Äôt load. I‚Äôve tried deleting and reinstalling the app multiple times, but nothing works. I hope this can get fixed‚Ä¶
Title: Great app, new issues

Content: I‚Äôve been using Etsy for almost ten years now. Even more nowadays; considering everything that has been going on in America.  Many people have lost their jobs due to layoffs or permanent closures. Etsy is the shopping app you NEED to be using when buying ANYTHING. These vendors pour their heart and soul into their products. Support the vendors, and support Americans who craft quality products to provide for their family.
Title: Best app for handmade goods

Content: (On PC) Since I wanted to change my name, first I had to verify it. After I hit the the ‚Äúconfirm‚Äù button in the confirmation email, it directed me straight to the site. It even had a header at the top saying that my email address was verified. Yet when I went to edit I my profile, it kept saying that I needed to verify it. After, I just wanted to delete my account all together. The the deletion request wouldn‚Äôt send to my email despite the verification email reaching my email 20 minutes prior. This is unnecessarily complicated to just EDIT your profile. Do better.
Title: Signing in, Deletion, and Account Problems

Content: The constant harassment of the CannaCrafters instead of creating an Age Verification Option is RIDICULOUS and causing paid members to leave the platform. They allow shops to sell mass made items on the platform to operate with impunity with their shops filled with bulk items from overseas that are NOT handmade in any sense of the word and should be sold on Bulk Websites like AliExpress... Yet they mass delete our handmade hard work instead of setting up something as simple as an Age Verification? Etsy likes to bite off its own nose to spite its face a lot but it‚Äôs 2021 and Cannabis is legal in MANY places. My 4+ years here are officially done.
Title: Etsy Is NOT for crafters...

Content: Etsy is pretty good app, I‚Äôve found lots of stuff I like. There‚Äôs one thing that I really don‚Äôt like about it though, there‚Äôs no button to say your not interested in items it recommends. I‚Äôve recently been getting these items that I don‚Äôt like and there‚Äôs no way to get them to go away, that‚Äôs why I‚Äôd like a button to say you‚Äôre no interested in those particular items. I‚Äôd be really grateful if you added a feature like this.
Title: Great but it could be better

Content: LOVE this app. Use it all day every day for my business. My one suggestion would be for us that do a ton of our business on Etsy, let us search our purchase history or favorites like we can on a desktop! It would make it so much easier for us that make 20 different purchases a day! We could re-order so much more easily by giving us a search bar under our purchases and favorites tab! Thank you! Erin
Title: Please add search bar to purchases!

Content: I‚Äôve never had an issue with a seller or Etsy, so when my package went missing, I found that I had no real help or support from Etsy. No one to call seller tried to help with a bunch of emails to me telling me what I already know, post office, case/ claim  filed I‚Äôm still waiting. Once this is resolved, either I get my missing package or refund from who??? I‚Äôm Etsy out! Bye
Title: Etsy not helpful

Content: I have ordered many things off Etsy and every time I have been fully satisfied. It‚Äôs great. App works well. The only thing I‚Äôd love to see would be a sort of ‚Äúlists‚Äù option. I have everything I like hearted but I wish I could separate what I like from what I want to get others for birthdays or Christmas gifts for example. If I could see this I think it would be a great addition.
Title: Love Etsy just wish for one thing...

Content: I‚Äôve been a huge fan of Etsy for as long as I can remember. I love to support the vendors for their creativity and skill they put into their ‚Äúproducts‚Äù. The Etsy App makes from searching for items very easy, to posting payments to vendors very easy. Two thumbs guys/gals! I hope everyone is being careful and taking every precaution to keep their families safe. Keep up the good work!
Title: ETSY APP

Content: Etsy offers an awesome array of items. The website is slow and cumbersome, and maybe some improvements could be made.   It takes too long to get messages up, and it‚Äôs also hard to find purchases sometimes, when there are multiple.  I have found a lot of great stuff on Etsy!
Title: Needs improvement

Content: I bought Savannah‚Äôs calendars last year for Christmas gifts and have purchased them again this year. They feature beautiful photographs printed and presented on heavy, high quality paper. The calendars were carefully packaged and arrived in pristine condition. I highly recommend this seller for both the quality of her artwork as well as the first-class handling of her product.
Title: Savannah Rose Wildlife Calendar

Content: Ordered a few times off etsy and never received items I paid for.  Opened a claim after about a month and never heard anything back and forgot about it, no alerts, no email no messages.  A couple months later I opened the app to check and they closed the case because they never notified me of messages received.  Not breaking the bank it was a 16 dollar baby shirt but the lack of notification on Etsys part means I will not be buying anything else thru this app again.  I get notified of messages from a seller but not messages from Etsy themselves updating status of a claim?? Unacceptable
Title: Never received item never got refunded

Content: The app is great for purchasing unique, custom treasures. However it comes with limitations - you can really only purchase or message with vendors.   There is no way to edit your account settings (update password or email) through the app itself. This seems like a mindless mishap that should be available in an update. I shouldn‚Äôt have to leave my mobile to go to a computer or have to exit the app to go on a mobile browser just to update my account information.
Title: Functional with limitations

Content: Like that I can submit reviews with photos, in fact that‚Äôs really all I use the app for, but c‚Äômon with the ridiculous timing of notifications.  I have to keep my phone on in case of emergencies during the night and my Etsy picks don‚Äôt qualify.   I actually deleted it because of this, but just downloaded it again to do sellers the solid of providing them with great reviews when they earn them.  Guess I‚Äôll manually disable the notifications but the app should be smarter than that.
Title: Notifications at 2:55am??

Content: I use this app a lot. I like to support small businesses. The app can be annoying though. I get a lot of notifications every day about updates on ‚Äúfavorites‚Äù and ‚Äúdeals‚Äù. I‚Äôve tried turning the notifications for those thing off and it still does it multiple times a day. Lately the notifications don‚Äôt go away even after opening it and looking at them.
Title: A Few Gliches

Content: The app makes it so easy to search and find what I‚Äôm looking for! And with the fast check out (the app even scanned my credit card so I didn‚Äôt have to type in the number) I was able to get on with my day after just a few clicks and with the satisfaction knowing that the perfect item was on its way!
Title: Quick & Easy

Content: The new "AI"/search assistant makes it impossible to find what you're looking for in the app. Now when you search, it shows you just a handful of results from different categories to force you to narrow your search with no "show all results" option. Plus when I'm shopping online, I don't want to chat with AI, I just want to enter my keywords and see the results. I've always had a positive experience with sellers on Etsy and enjoyed many purchases I've made here, but I will have to browse from my computer or web browser app from now on.
Title: New search "AI" makes app unusable

Content: Love being able to search and buy from small producers and makers, including internationally. The app (and the website) could use better sorting and organizing capabilities for us hardcore users who research something, save ‚Äúfavorites,‚Äù but can‚Äôt view those things in the order they were saved. Minor quibble, have loved all my Etsy finds.
Title: Fantastic portal

Content: These are the perfect projects to keep hands and head busy while traveling ending with a stylish hat for yourself and give as a gift.  Patterns are clear to understand and if you need a refresh on a particular stitch or understanding the customer service is quick and friendly.  I used 5mm needle to accommodate the request for a larger hat to allow pony tail, worked perfectly.
Title: The Perfect Summer Hats

Content: The one thing I really dislike about Etsy is the fact that you have to do a little research before you purchase anything because it can probably be a knock off from China or just a direct purchase from China for something that is not handmade at all. It should be a requirement for all listings on Etsy to be handmade only. There are way too many items available that are not handmade and I just resale of other products. Very disappointing.
Title: ALL PRODUCTS ON ETSY SHOULD BE HAND MADE

Content: 99% of the stuff for sale on Etsy is mass produced Ali express junk falsely advertised as hand made or vintage and then sold for 10x its worth. Etsy straight up doesn‚Äôt care that they are falsely advertising products as hand made and then they turn around and actively punish the few real small businesses on their site. You are much more likely to find real hand crafted items by browsing instagram or other social media. ALWAYS REVERSE IMAGE SEARCH BEFORE BUYING! The products on Etsy are most likely cheap factory wholesale junk and you can find out by searching the image on google.
Title: Cheap factory junk sold as ‚Äúhand made‚Äù

Content: I have found the cutest, most unique gifts. Etsy is much more personal and fun than the giant online marketplace. I prefer to support small business, and have purchased quite a few things from small business owners on Etsy. I adore the witchy jewelry for myself, the Elvis pillows for my BFF and the ham radio t-shirts for my boyfriend. An artist from Ukraine made my favorite witchy necklace, the triple moon design.  Thanks, Etsy sellers.
Title: Love Etsy

Content: I am about to stop purchasing things on Etsy as I do not want to rate a purchase every time I buy something. My five stars do not mean anything as I‚Äôm forced to give them. When I have had a problem, I talk with the owner and it is resolved. I would never leave anything less than 5 because they are small business owners. Now when I think someone has really hit it out of the park, they still get the same rating ü§î

Content: I cannot unlike an item I once liked. Can you please fix this I don‚Äôt want to see old things that I don‚Äôt want on my wish list anymore. Also, I do not like the format. I just wish you can put a filter that says shops with the most reviews. Because I can‚Äôt tell which sellers are genuine sometimes. Though the shop may say it has hundreds of reviews, but it won‚Äôt show the reviews that are most recent or any bad reviews.
Title: Unliking an item is impossible

Content: Seems great so far except two issues.   I can‚Äôt justify using PayPal when they charge $4+ in fees on a $12 order and don‚Äôt even make it obvious what they‚Äôre doing until after checkout. I‚Äôd much rather be able to filter down to Apple Pay or credit card options.   The app also doesn‚Äôt natively accept hide my email. It works fine on the website.
Title: Needs payment type filter

Content: I love shopping on Etsy, and I know many creative people whose work I would love to see here. Unfortunately, a bunch of them have felt that the costs they incurred when trying to use Etsy as a vending space are too high, and they have shied away from it. Others whom I used to see here have left this platform. I‚Äôm hoping the company takes this into consideration and makes some adjustments.
Title: Great for Buyers, Less so for Vendors

Content: It makes no sense that I cannot access the pdf patterns purchased in the Etsy app. It is extremely frustrating to have to log into my Etsy account on a PC, to access and download the patterns. If I buy it through the Etsy app, why can‚Äôt I access it through the app?? Further, the app checkout goes in and out of allowing me to full checkout. One moment I can checkout, another it‚Äôs a totally full black screen with an odd tiny white speck in the left corner. Don‚Äôt even know if this app is safe to buy things when the checkout is working. And , yes, I‚Äôve updated my app and iPad.
Title: Etsy App

Content: Sometimes fake sellers slip through the cracks, but Etsy immediately deals with the issue and gets you your money back. Very rarely sellers aren‚Äôt very clear with descriptions on items, or technical issues occur. I haven‚Äôt had much trouble with these occurrences because most sellers are easy to communicate with and will solve your problem as quickly as possible. Great, well made products and a great app!
Title: Very Good App

Content: I never got the item I paid $115 for. I ordered it in June of 2022. Seller closed store and never responded. Etsy said they would give me a refund. I never got the refund, spoke with customer service multiple times trying to get the refund. One of them said it was sent to a visa ending in a four digit number that I‚Äôve never had, plus I used Apple Pay to purchase my item. I have screenshots of the chat, and the card number she said it was sent to. The customer service is terrible. I‚Äôm obviously not getting my money back, but I‚Äôm never spending money on this site again.
Title: Etsy owes me money.

Content: It is 5:09 pm central time. I have been watching this item for awhile. I just sent her some questions and she responded in minutes. I think it‚Äôs about 2am there. This is a wooden mobile hangar that looks more like furniture and is white to match the wall of my art room. I have a largish brass mobile and I think this bracket will be perfect. Title: Tiny Problem

Content: if you‚Äôre trying to start a business PLEASE don‚Äôt use this app high percent chance you wont get a sale if you don‚Äôt sponsor your items another really high chance  your items wont be buyer worthy maybe a lot of interest by clicks and views but regardless of the fact if you haven't sold one product you still will be charged x10 more by etsy  even if you make a sell or have no listings üòê What I‚Äôm trying to say is it‚Äôs better to start your own business website and do social media promotes (instagram, facebook etc) rather than relying on etsy with taxes and weird fees.
Title: Starter Business üòê

Title: Need My Receipt To Track My Order

Title: scrolling

Title: Multiple charges in 1 day

Content: Etsy hipster developers prioritizing form over function is very edgy, so congratulations. Every shopping app on the planet allows you to copy tracking numbers on shipped items to the clipboard, but not this performance art app. This kind of functionality would make too much sense. Instead, let's provide a tracking page within our own UI so it looks pretty, but isn't up to date and the user can't track it themselves unless they literally use a pen and paper to copy the tracking number. Good job, I just remembered why I search for things on Etsy and buy them on eBay/Amazon.
Title: lol

Content: Etsy is the best site I have found to connect with small businesses. usually people who share in your same interests, and then you purchase items from them. helping them live their dream of supporting them selves through what they love to do.   That and you can get better quality items then from a store.
Title: Where I do my shopping.

Content: Really great to be able to connect with small businesses and entrepreneurs! Effective user interface, and product quality from star sellers usually always comes through. Make sure to look into the shop before purchasing- spend time looking at product photos and descriptions as well as the overall vibe the shop gives off. Happy shopping :)

Content: Etsy has everything. If you have seen it somewhere else and wish you had gotten it, chances are you will find it on Etsy. Everything I have ordered from Etsy has been great. No complaints. Content: I love the idea and using this app. Buying from local artisans is an AMAZING idea. However, there is no where on the app to edit MY (the BUYER) information. Content: Etsy used to be great. I would‚Äôve given it 5 stars, but ever since this update happened the app has been glitching terribly on me. Content: I absolutely love Etsy. But the app is infuriating. When I go to look through my lists, the app doubles certain things. And now has begun to quadruple items. And there‚Äôs nothing I can do to fix it. And when trying to remove items, I have to close out of the app and reopen it to see the changes. There should also be a way to bulk select items to remove from lists. Not to mention when I‚Äôm searching for items I see an add for the same item at least four times. I would much rather use a desktop than the app.
Title: Love Etsy, not the app

Content: I love purchasing items on Etsy, but my Apple Pay never works. I contacted Etsy support and they told me there was nothing they could do about it and that I should contact Apple Pay support, but I‚Äôve never had a problem with Apple Pay on any other app. This is obviously an Etsy issue and I don‚Äôt think they‚Äôre interested in fixing it üòî

Title: Such unique products!

Content: Recently any purchases I make tgat have pdf download I can not download  Email download do not come to my email I have contacted support and they have been of no help Most patterns that I buy to download are crochet patterns  I am going to start using Ravelry as the place where I buy my patterns  There has never been a problem with them
Title: Etsy Support of no help

Content: This app feels like a casino. I have seizure risks with animations and have memory problems following a brain injury.   Etsy has put them everywhere ‚Äî I was looking for a gift today but will have to shop elsewhere. After viewing just three products I‚Äôm at risk for a seizure and I can barely remember any important details about products because I‚Äôm looking out for animations that may trigger them.   Current accessibility guidelines suggest that animations should end and to give users the option to disable them.   A/B testing shows that more animations don‚Äôt equal more sales so vulnerable ppl are being tortured and endangered for nothing but the latest failed trend in behaviorism flavored marketing.   Please make this app accessible by giving users the option to disable all animations.   You are losing business, disrespecting users autonomy trying to control their behavior with ‚Äúvisual nudges.‚Äù
Title: Inaccessibility issues

Content: The variety of color pallets, creative designs and eclectic art styles make this site a terrific match no matter what your preferences are for wall art!  I bought my first three and when I revisited the sight, I bought three more.  Prices are amazingly low for the quality of art you can purchase!  Highly recommended by this customer!
Title: Incredible!

Content: My husband spent his life in the Coast Guard. He left as a Lieutenant. He sieged boats. Of crime and took them to court. It was a career he loved and is proud of the Military. Mike‚Äôs patriot ring put tears in his eyes when he understood the meaning. Mike is a great designer and  I would say using him would be is very good after the sale wife of a great choice. He made my 72 year old new husband Cry on our  Wedding Day. THANK YOU Mike You‚Äôre the best! Dawn M Dungy ( Krzeminski)
Title: Ring

Etsy allows and let‚Äôs a customer message the seller, also allows for you to save items and to also create videos and share with the viewer of the product. I give Etsy 5 stars!!

I Especially get a lot of organic or natural items here. I love Etsy! I hope they keep up the good work and keep doing good things in the world! Thanks üôèüèº

Of course there is a vendor who disappoints but that has happened only once or twice.  Overall a great place to find just about anything unique.   Great way to help individual entrepreneurs too.
Title: Use this website a lot

Content: Disappointed that my kids can‚Äôt shop on Etsy for gift suggestions for family and friends. Too many adult content items in EVERY category. Very unexpected in what key words I‚Äôve been searching under. Please fix this! So many great products but hate to be visually jarred by vaginas, penises and foul language.
Title: Etsy needs an ‚Äúadults only‚Äù section

Content: Etsy recently changed its policy about how much money they take from their creators. It used to be 5% and now it is 6.5% They shouldn't have done that, and by doing that it shows they care more about making money for them, than the actual independent sellers they host. They're encouraging drop-shipping and companies to invade a site that was once used for independent creators.  As a seller on etsy who is just trying to make some money from selling the things I take the time to create, I am disheartened by how Etsy treats smaller creators. Do better.
Title: Etsy no longer cares about its creators.

Content: I have bought from Etsy many times. My son gave me a gift card for Christmas. I had such a hard time spending it because they have too much great stuff. I always came to Etsy for something specific but to just go through to pick what I wanted was not easy. I finally spent it and can‚Äôt wait to get all my goodies!
Title: Gift card

Content: Etsy needs to more tightly regulate the sellers they allow on their platform. Etsy is no longer a platform for artists or vintage items; now it is all scam merchandise made by mass-producing sellers. I‚Äôm sure Etsy continues to allow this simply so they can profit from the additional sales. It is a shame what Etsy has become and I no longer buy from Etsy and know many people who do the same. I will never buy from Etsy again, and I no longer sell on Etsy because true customers are lost in the flood of scam items from Ali express.  Shameful.

Content: I love that I can find creative and original gifts on Etsy. They‚Äôre always better quality than anything I buy in stores and it‚Äôs something not everyone has. Content: If you want to find items that are original and can‚Äôt be found anywhere else Etsy is the place to go. They have everything and the stores are as unique as the people who run each and every one. I have bought some of my favors things on Etsy. I love Etsy and will always shop there.

Title: VERY PLEASED

Content: i used to really love etsy and i constantly purchase on it for my slime business. i have been trying to purchase a bunch stuff for about a week now but every time i click on the credit card or paypal option (i have tried both) it will load for a second and then close. yes, i am on wifi and i also tried updating and deleting and re-downloading etsy. Content: All of the pieces received are beautifully crafted. They are made strong and they are truly unique  pieces of art.  Customer service is above and beyond. Title: The satisfaction of scrolling

Content: The entire concept of Etsy is literally a scam, I deleted my entire store. They take what was 3.5% of your sale to then 5% AND took 5% of your shipping label (which you don‚Äôt get any revenue from), then to raise it AGAIN to a whopping 15%!!!!! Are you kidding? That‚Äôs not even including the 20 cents you charge to shop owners to list an item, and say you have 5 of those items. They will charge you $1! By the time I listed a $20 item, after materials, shipping materials, and fees. I made maybe $5-$6 in revenue. Y‚Äôall are such scammers and SO GREEDY. The time will come when something completely takes over Etsy.
Title: The worst ever, such a scam

Content: Etsy is now taking money away from sellers unwillingly. They post ads and if the buyer clicks on the ad, and within 30 days buys ANYTHING from Etsy, they take a significant portion of the profits. There is no way to opt out of this. You did NOT give proper warning, and people will need to re adjust their prices and make their items more expensive to compensate, which likely means less things will be bought. No longer encouraging other artists to use Etsy, instead encouraging them make your own store. If you like to support artists ask if they have a non etsy store, many do!
Title: Unfair mew rule, stop supporting Etsy

Title: Item searching

Content: It took me a total of six hours to place this order, including many customer / seller emails, on-line-chats to Etsy, and customer service phone calls to Etsy.  Here is just a few of the things I encountered as I attempted to order 6 custom imprinted T-shirts from seller Wild Orchid Designs in Colorado:  No instructions on how to send graphics design & what format they required.  Was trying to order 4 of one size and 2 of another size; there was no way to put in more than 1 quantity by size.    The seller had a special of ‚Äúbuy 5 & get 1 free.  Your system could not deal with that.  Every time I tried to click on the item I wanted to order, I would just get kicked completely out of Etsy.  I gave my correct Visa card info.  Three times it was declined, before it finally went through with exact same information.

Title: Terrible

Content: I opened up a new bank account and used it to deposit my money from my Etsy shop. My new account is stored no where online except on my Etsy account and in 8 days, someone in the world got my new checking account number and routing number ‚Äúcoincidently‚Äù. But if you want to accept payments from people buying from your shop, Etsy forces you to store your banking info on their website. Again, my new banking information was only stored on the Etsy site. If you want to sell on Etsy, open I brand new bank account specifically for depositing money from your Etsy shop.
Title: Banking info stolen

Title: So many different items.

Content: The functionality of this app is, admittedly, solid.  Unfortunately, it is massively disappointing that Etsy is going the way of eBay, in that they over very little to no protection for buyers.   Etsy knows how they make their money: Seller fees. Because of this, there is no enforcing rules against sellers, and many sellers have become unbelievably slow in fulfilling orders. To be honest, it‚Äôs pretty impressive how lazy they have become. You really are rolling the dice when you order anything from Etsy that you need to have by a specific date.  There are numerous other issues, but they‚Äôre all along the same lines. Shipping would probably be the other big one. Etsy allows sellers to charge exorbitant fees for shipping. I ordered three stickers a while back, and I was charged ELEVEN DOLLARS for shipping these 2‚Äù circle stickers.  Bye, Etsy.

I cant even see the item before the slideshow is scrolling on and not loading pictures. From what I can see, it gives me a headache because they flick at random times. I have ADHD and I cant use this app because it gives me sensory overload. I won‚Äôt be using again until it changes because I literally can‚Äôt. :(
Title: Kill the slideshows.

Content: I prefer to shop small businesses as much as possible plus the creativity is in one place. I haven‚Äôt been disappointed and stay disappointed with a purchase. Content: honestly i really love etsy. i feel like people give it a lot of crap but i have found some amazing art and jewelry from artists around the globe that i never would‚Äôve got without it. if you can get keep looking and find the amazing small artists you will get awesome stuff.

Content: I downloaded this app in search of hand made wind chimes. I was able to find so many gorgeous ones, but am unable to hear the sound that accompanies the seller‚Äôs videos. I‚Äôm reluctant to spend money on something that makes noise, when I can‚Äôt hear the noise it makes- making this app completely useless to me. Title: Lacking the obvious....

Content: This is such an amazing company. Title: Great company

Title: Beautiful

Content: I love using Etsy to find unique items from artisans across the U.S. and around the world. I primarily shop for original jewelry pieces and I can always find high quality items through Etsy. I love the ability to filter and favorite items I‚Äôm interested in purchasing.
Title: Supporting local and independent

Content: When I shop on Etsy, I am not only making my dreams come true (finding amazing handmade things personalized to my liking), I know I am making the sellers‚Äô dreams come true as well by supporting their small businesses. What a time to be alive where we can do all of that with the click of a button.  Thank you, Etsy!!!
Title: Making dreams come true

Content: Scammers on Etsy - beware!  I purchased a $600 machine and two days after the last expected delivery date the dealer has vanished. Etsy is forcing me to dispute this via dialogue with the seller, however the seller, being a scammer, is gone.  Etsy has pushed back my time line for when they will intervene.  It‚Äôs frustrating they are twiddling their thumbs and ignoring my report of this scammer in the time they should be tracing where my money is.  There are countless amazing sellers on Etsy, but seems like scammers have free range as well
Title: Beware of scams on Etsy

Content: BobbiePinsandNeedles is the best Etsy store I have ever had the pleasure of dealing with.  There are many more options and varieties to choose from.  The quality of workmanship is far superior to anything I have seen by her competitors.  I highly recommend this store over any other for the products found here.  I will definitely be a returning customer.
Title: Masks

Content: Great resource for finding just what you want. Wish there were a few more filter options to organize search hits. Beware many sellers are located outside USA and shipping can take a very long time and / or be completely lost and not trackable. One of my sellers completely disappeared with my money but Etsy customer service refunded me so that works.
Title: Great service for unique items but beware of some seller

Content: I love Etsy, but wish they would address the long standing issue of not being able to delete closed shops from the saved favorites list.  I can‚Äôt scroll through my favorites anymore because of wasted dead spaceüòû
Title: I Love Etsy, but needs some improvement

Content: I have never been disappointed in any item I purchased for gifts or for myself. Superb quality, items just as described, sellers willing to work with your special needs. My go to for everything!!you have a customer for life!!!

Content: I enjoy shopping at Etsy stores. The products are unique and usually hand made. Also supporting individual shop owners is important to me. Content: I appreciate all the personalization options and interesting items from all over the world. One suggestion for the app: It would be great if we could hide the items that we don‚Äôt want to see and aren‚Äôt interested in. It would improve browsing and make it easier to find things.
Title: Great place for unique finds!

Content: I would like to share my experience with ESTY. We have bought serval items now and very, very pleased with all the items. Everything from Dolphin Statue‚Äôs, to clothes and pictures. Thank you for your honesty, beauty of products and outstanding customer service.   Sincerely,   Kathy

Title: The AI Search Engine Ruined It.

Content: I shop on Etsy all the time.
